We want to send the magic bots we've developed to our researchers working in different locations. But it's a long trip, and the roads are sometimes dangerous, so...we thought of you.

I've prepared a magic bot summoning controller for you. Just use it to summon a magic bot for each researcher in the field. And you can use it yourself, too. Nothing wrong with a little "field testing," eh?

Klissa has the controller for you. Have fun with the bots!

Wait, you need the controller?

I'm sorry, but I let Fitae and Zerit borrow it. Who knows what they wanted it for—probably something irrelevant.

I'm sure one of them has it. Go pester them!

The Magic Bot Summoning Controller? Sure—here you go.

Use it like any other item: open your inventory, place the cursor over the controller, and right-click.

Your destination: Veltor in Balder's Refuge.

The Magic Bot Summoning Controller? Sure—here you go.

Use it like any other item: open your inventory, place the cursor over the controller, and right-click.

Your destination: Sindel in Balder's Refuge.

What brings you this far?

A magic bot device, eh? Let me see."Here you go."

Looks like it's going to be helpful.

And just between us, it might be fun, too.
A magic bot device...what will they think of next.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Control it with this."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
I'm sure I'll figure out how a magic bot can help around here. Still, it makes you wonder about my colleagues back in Allemantheia...
